#labels Featured


== Simple data access object for csv files in php5. ==
    by Kazuyoshi Tlacaelel.

= Some features =


== Cells ==

  # *[cell]* _cell fetcher_ 
  # *[fillCell]* _cell value filler_ 


== Headers ==

  # *[countHeaders]* _header counter_ 
  # *[createHeaders]* _header creator_ 
  # *[headers]* _header fetcher_ 
  # *[injectHeaders]* _header injector_ 


== Columns ==

  # *[appendColumn]* _column appender_ 
  # *[column]* _column fetcher_ 
  # *[fillColumn]* _collumn data injector_ 
  # *[hasColumn]* _column existance checker_ 
  # *[removeColumn]* _column remover_ 
  # *[walkColumn]* _column walker_ 


== Rows ==

  # *[appendRow]* _row appender_ 
  # *[countRows]* _row counter_ 
  # *[fillRow]* _fillRow_ 
  # *[hasRow]* _row existance checker_ 
  # *[removeRow]* _row remover_ 
  # *[row]* _row fetcher_ 
  # *[rows]* _multiple row fetcher_ 
  # *[walkRow]* _row walker_ 


== Transformation/Manipulation ==

  # *[asymmetry]* _asymmetric data fetcher_ 
  # *[connect]* _header and row relationship builder_ 
  # *[coordinateable]* _checks if a coordinate is valid_ 
  # *[rawArray]* _raw data as array_ 
  # *[settings]* _settings alterator_ 
  # *[symmetric]* _data length/symmetry checker_ 
  # *[symmetrize]* _all rows length equalizer_ 
  # *[uses]* _csv file loader_ 
  # *[walkGrid]* _grid walker_
